here's a test you could try...
change the 'port' you are using in /etc/ssh/sshd_config to, say, 2345; then re-start the ssh server (/etc/init.d/ssh restart); then try ssh'ing from work into your home box via port 2345
the point is to test if your work firewall is blocking outgoing port 22 (as someone mentioned earlier)
